rules: AUTHORITATIVE SOURCE: Follow all guidelines in CLAUDE.md at the project root
QUICK REFERENCE ONLY - See CLAUDE.md for details:
• Language: English-only for all artifacts (code, docs, comments, commits)
• Security: No credentials in code, validate all inputs, prevent injection/XSS
• Documentation: Update with code changes, maintain ARCHITECTURE.md
• Testing: Target 80%+ coverage, comprehensive unit and integration tests
• Code Quality: Showcase-quality (readable, refactored), follow platform conventions
• Best Practices: Check latest patterns for Ditto, Flutter SDK, and related tech
• Platform Best Practices: Consult .claude/guides/best-practices/ for platform-specific patterns
